titleStmt.title: The Scotch Presbyterian eloquence, or, The foolishness of their teaching discovered from their books, sermons and prayers and some remarks on Mr. Rule's late Vindication of the kirk
titleStmt.author: Curate, Jacob.
Calder, Robert, 1658-1723.

notesStmt.note: Dedication signed: Jacob Curate (pseudonym of Gilbert Crokatt and John Monro)
Attributed to Gilbert Crokatt and John Monro. "This work has been often wrongly assigned to Robert Calder, who may have edited some of the reprints"--Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.)
Reproduction of original in Rutgers University Library.
